views.markdown:
Compatible (specifically written) for iOS 10. Tested on iPhones 7 iOS 10.1.1

LSHiddenTools10 gives you smooth and useful options to make hidden, more functional and cuter the Sight and the Behavior of your LockScreen adding these nice Features:

- Hide the StatusBar on LockScreen.

- Hide the Clock and the Date on the LockScreen (the StatusBar still shows itself).

- Hide the Press to Unlock Label.

- Hide the LockPad on the StatusBar.

- Hide (and disable) the Camera Access and Dots.

- Hide (and disable) the Today View Access.

- Hide the Today View Date Text swiping Right.

- Hide the Blur taping on the Search Field of the Spotlight swiping Right.

- Hide the Application Suggestion on the LockScreen.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

Configure options from Settings.
